title: Dragon's Tears
description: Discovering that you may be the last dragon shifter alive—and that you’re destined to take four hot alphas as your mates—can through a girl for a bit of a loop. But now that I’m getting my powers and my enemies under control, my confidence is growing. A little hike into the mountains to uncover my mother’s last secret seems like no big deal with my men by my side.Too bad life has other plans. The farther I go, the more other secrets surface. Secrets that threaten the fragile peace between the shifters and the fae. Secrets that could destroy the bond I’m forming with my mates. With unexpected villains around every corner, it’ll take all my newfound strength to survive the fray.*The Dragon Shifter's Mates is a complete steamy paranormal romance series where the heroine doesn't have to choose. Expect sexy situations, intense action, and a quartet of alluring wolf, bear, jaguar, and eagle shifters you’ll wish you could make your mates.*
author: Eva Chase
